numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed something about legacy applicants.
2. A legacy applicant is more likely to get into a school than a non-legacy applicant.
3. I wondered about money and acceptance into big colleges.
4. If a person has more money, then the person may be more likely to be accepted into a big college because of legacy status.
6. Some people in my community do not have much money.
7. If a person does not have much money, then the person may be affected in what college the person gets into.
8. The headline is: Advantages of having a legacy status.
